Read first program's input

   read*, n

         even_ind =i

      else

         odd = odd +1

         odd_ind =i

      end if

      index_result = even_ind

   else

      index_result = odd_ind

   end if

   ! Now convert index_result to string S

   write(s, '(i0)') index_result

   s = adjustl(s)  ! To remove leading spaces

   N = len_trim(s)

   ! Process second program's logic

   mod_arr =0

   mod_cnt =0

   radix =1

   do i=1,N

      integer :: digit

      character(1) :: current_char

      current_char = s(N - (i-1):N - (i-1))  ! The ith character from the end

      integer :: tmp

      tmp = mod(digit * radix, 2019) if (i >1) then
